name: Protect the test subjects
description:
Story

Everyone in your city has been kidnapped by an evil scientist who wants to experiment on you. Luckily you have managed to escape from the group and have found your way into a control room. From there you can control one of the defense plates which you can use to try to save your fellow citizens.

Controls

PC/Mac/Linux - Move the mouse to move the defense plate horizontally.

Mobile - Touch anywhere on the screen to move the defense plate horizontally.

Plans

I originally wanted more experiments, but only had time for 2. In the future I might add more, as well as improve the existing ones. I also want to improve the look of the game, and potentially make my own music. There are also a few bugs that I'm aware of and want to squish.

Credits

Programming, Art, Game design - Me

Music - Golf Cart Chase by Dynamedion (https://dynamedion.com/)

Note: I have not been able to test the Linux or Mac versions. If you try them, please tell me wheter or not they work.
